items.title: 'Aston Villa probeert promotieheld terug te halen na vertrek van Malen'

items.title: VI Live: Heerenveen komt in de slotfase toch weer op voorsprong

items.title: Foden legt uit wat Semenyo zo goed maakt: 'Zo iemand hadden we nog niet'
items.summary: Phil Foden heeft uitgelegd wat Antoine Semenyo zo'n goede versterking voor Manchester City maakt. De 25-jarige Engelsman stelt dat de Ghanees iets aan de selectie van The Citizens toevoegt dat er nog niet was.

items.title: Inquiry launched after Chelsea fans complain about policing at end of Charlton game
items.summary: Fans upset at being unexpectedly ‚Äòheld back‚Äô at the Valley Police action ‚Äòuncomfortably like that from past decades‚Äô The Metropolitan police has commissioned an independent investigation after receiving complaints over its treatment of Chelsea supporters after the west London club‚Äôs FA Cup tie at Charlton Athletic last Saturday. The Chelsea Supporters‚Äô Trust called for action earlier this week after writing to the force to voice concerns over an operation that saw approximately 3,000 travelling fans held back outside the Valley without prior notice following the conclusion of a game that kicked off at 8pm in freezing temperatures. items.title: $200,000 for nine-darter then bullseye? Saudi tournament offers new prize
items.summary: Players competing in the Riyadh Season Saudi Arabia Darts Masters could win an astonishing $200,000 if they produce a nine-darter followed by a bullseye in the World Series of Darts event.

items.title: 'Lang bungelt tussen basis en transfermarkt, Napoli spot vervanger'

items.title: Smith: I am ready for unification fight with Stevenson or Lopez
items.summary: Dalton Smith says he is ready for a unification fight with either Shakur Stevenson or Teofimo Lopez after he claimed the WBC super-lightweight title and believes rival Adam Azim has to prove himself at world level before they fight.

items.title: Ford CEO speaks on Red Bull F1 partnership & Verstappen's 'coolness' during 2025 season
items.summary: Sky Sports' Craig Slater speaks to Ford's CEO Jim Farley about the company joining forces with Red Bull for the F1 2026 season.

items.title: Luis Enrique open to using sin-bins like rugby
items.summary: Paris Saint-Germain coach Luis Enrique is open to a sin-bin-style system in soccer whereby players are temporarily removed from a game for fouls.

items.title: Arbeloa: Madrid Copa exit to 2nd-tier side 'painful'
items.summary: New Real Madrid coach √Ålvaro Arbeloa took responsibility for the team's "painful" 3-2 Copa del Rey defeat to second-tier Albacete on Wednesday, defending his decision to rest a number of senior players.

items.title: UEFA: $55M loss due to drop in U.S. dollar
items.summary: The U.S. dollar value dropped about 9% against a range of foreign currencies in the first months of 2025 and UEFA blames that fall for a $55M loss of revenue.

items.title: Sky Sports to show Final Stage of inaugural FIFA Women's Champions Cup

items.title: Richarlison out for seven weeks with hamstring injury
items.summary: Tottenham forward Richarlison is ruled out for up to seven weeks with a hamstring injury.

items.title: Thomas Tuchel says England players‚Äô social skills as vital as talent at World Cup
items.summary: Manager stresses squad harmony crucial at tournament Two friendlies in March to come before naming squad Thomas Tuchel stressed talent alone is not enough to make his World Cup squad because the right ‚Äúsocial skills‚Äù and personality will be needed for England to stand a chance of glory this summer. The head coach has spoken extensively of building a ‚Äúbrotherhood‚Äù and placed heavy emphasis on ensuring there is the right mentality within the camp. England are one of the favourites but the shirt has weighed heavily in the past and Tuchel will look at how players interact with each other before he names his 26-man squad for the finals. items.title: 'Head coach' vs. 'manager': What's the difference? Does it matter?
items.summary: Who would be a football manager? As it turns out in the Premier League, an increasing number of head coaches. Just ask Enzo Maresca and Ruben Amorim.
